title: Gasoline price per liter in selected countries - December 2019
yAxis: Price per liter in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price per liter in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
The highest Country Italy has 1.08 more Price per liter in U.S. dollars than the lowest Country United States.
